mapper.select: SELECT tp_number, tp_career, tp_title, tp_comment, tp_accu_answer, tp_average, tt_subject, tt_school, tbl_user.user_name FROM tbl_user, tbl_tutor_page WHERE tbl_user.user_email = tbl_tutor_page.user_email AND tp_number = #{num}

SELECT tp_number, tp_career, tp_title, tp_comment, tp_accu_answer, tp_average, tt_subject, tt_school, tbl_user.user_name FROM tbl_user, tbl_tutor_page WHERE tbl_user.user_email = tbl_tutor_page.user_email ORDER BY tp_number DESC OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY

SELECT tp_number, tp_career, tp_title, tp_comment, tp_accu_answer, tp_average, tt_subject, tt_school, tbl_user.user_name FROM tbl_user, tbl_tutor_page WHERE tbl_user.user_email = tbl_tutor_page.user_email AND tt_subject LIKE '%' || #{subject} || '%' ORDER BY tp_average DESC OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
